h-t1: The language used in XI-XIV centuries is called old Turkic language. Mahmood Kashgari's Devonu-Lugatit-Turk Collection of Turkish Vocabularies, Yusuf Khos Hajib's Kutadgu Bilig, Knowledge that Reaches the World, Ahmed Yugnaki's Hibatul Haqayyk, Armugani of Truths, Khorezmi's Muhabbatnama, Rabguzi's Kissasi Rabguzi created in this language.
